SpecificationCreation.look
Class ClassTreeNode

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode
      SpecificationCreation.look.ClassTreeNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Cloneable, Comparable, MutableTreeNode, TreeNode
public class ClassTreeNode
extends DefaultMutableTreeNode
implements Comparable

A node in the class or property tree. If the minimum required linguistic information has been added it receives an ok-sign; if it was imported from another ontology, it's grey; if it signals a submenu, it's blue; if it is a property with a minimum cardinal restriction, it's red.

Version:
1.0 October 20 2008
Author:
Feikje Hielkema
See Also:
Serialized Form

ClassTreeNode

public ClassTreeNode(String value,
                     boolean shaded,
                     boolean completed)
Constructor. If shaded is true, the node-text is grey; if completed is true, the node receives an ok-sign.

Parameters:
value - Label
shaded - If true, text should be grey
completed - If true, add ok-sign

compareTo

public int compareTo(Object o)
              throws ClassCastException
Compares two nodes to order them in the tree; first nodes with cardinal restrictions, then order alphabetically.
